item.description:
It's September, summer is over, but that doesn't mean we can't toast the season in style.

 

Join the group and raise your glasses while we have once last social to toast the end of Summer 2012.  Please bring a bottle of sparkling wine from anywhere around the globe to share with the group.  Appetizers also greatly appreciated!

group.name: The MetroWest White Wine Meetup Group

item.name: Sparkling Summer Finale
